category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MES_3DPDF_UPDATE_WORKFLOW_CONTINUE_ON_ERROR
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the MES-Update3DPDFReports action handler should continue if any of the requests fail or return with an error when updating 3D PDF documents before sending them to an manufacturing execution system. Valid Values: True - The action handler continues to process requests if it encounters a problem. False - If the action handler encounters a problem, it stops processing requests and returns an error message.
